Job Description: Roles and Responsibility:        Advanced technical support for desktops, thin clients, InfoSec products (EP,Antivirus) backup and restore     Windows / Linux OS troubleshooting,Patch update and drivers installation - servers,OS backup / recovery knowledge - branch servers and low end Servers like Dhruva etc.      Networking concept (OSI,TCP/IP,Topology etc),Virtualisation skills - VM Disks monitoring and management,Anti Virus support at Server side.
